title: Everyday Minerals - Long Handled Kabuki Brush
description: Everyday MineralsLong Handled KabukiBrush Everyday Minerals Long Handled Kabuki Brush is the ideal brush for cheek, base, and face powders. Everyday Minerals Long Handled Kabuki Brush is made with a renewable Bamboo handle and synthetic hair. What Everyday Minerals loves most about bamboo, is that it's one of the world's most eco-friendly plants. The plant is found in diverse climates that range from hot tropics to freezing mountains, and has a really versatile short growing cycle. Bamboo is harvested three to five times a year instead of the typical 20 to 50 years of its wood counterparts. Measurements: 4.20" long, 1" wide, 2.50" ferrule to tip. Frequently Asked Questions: What products can I use if I'm a Vegan? Every single one! For the most up to date info, review the product ingredients list on each specific product. Are Everyday Minerals products safe for pregnant women? Everyday Minerals recommends that all expectant mothers check with their physician first before using their products, or any other line of products. How long will my Everyday Minerals products stay fresh and what is the best way to store them? Everyday Minerals creates their products using natural ingredients. Everyday Minerals believes in using ingredients that have a purpose and that do not contain any fillers or animal derived ingredients. To keep their products fresh, Everyday Minerals presents their products in smaller portions at affordable prices. When storing cosmetics and skin care products, please place them away from direct sunlight and heat, keep them in a cool place. Where are Everyday Minerals products made? Over 97% of Everyday Minerals' products are made by hand in Austin, TX. Everyday Minerals believes that living in the 'live music capital of the world'; inspires them to make the most creative products on earth! Does Everyday Minerals participate in animal testing? Everyday Minerals does NOT conduct testing on animals.

title: Sigma F80 - Flat Kabuki TM
description:
Unique Feature: Dense and flat head
Function: Buffed foundation application
Recommended Use: Blend liquid or cream products onto flat areas of the face such as the forehead and cheeks.

title: Tarte Cosmetics Amazonian Clay 12-Hour Full Coverage Foundation 1.7 fl oz.
description: Tarte Cosmetics Amazonian Clay 12-Hour Full Coverage Foundation provides flawless, long-lasting buildable coverage with a lightweight, multitasking formula. Amazonian clay acts as a smart ingredient to intuitively match your skin's tone and texture to conceal blemishes, discoloration and imperfections. Vitamin E softens and nourishes your skin while neutralizing free radicals. Micronized zinc and titanium protect against environmental damage. Light-Medium is ideal for light to medium skin with pink undertones.

title: Perricone MD Intensive Pore Minimizer, 4 fl. oz.
description: Unique to traditional pore treatments primarily designed to "fill" and superficially mask pores, Dr. Perricone's liquid treatment, Intensive Pore Minimizer treats the causes of pores by performing three modes of action. One, gently exfoliating the skin of build-up, two, firming the appearance of sagging pore walls and three, controlling the oil production that leads to shine and the appearance of blemishes.

title: Proactiv Solution Deep Cleansing Wash 24 Oz
description: An advanced wash for the face and body, designed to attack existing acne blemishes and help prevent new blemishes from forming
